Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 42nd overall pick, by Kansas City in 1965...
Traded from Kansas City to Los Angeles on 2/13/1967 (Going to KCA: SS I. Brown. Going to LA: LF G. Martin)...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1969, off Juan Marichal (SF)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/19/1969, off Dave Wickersham (CHC)...
Won World Series with Los Angeles in 1971...
